dmca.title: Infringement of John Wiley & Sons, Inc.'s Copyrights
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: pmurphy@wiley.com [mailto:pmurphy@wiley.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 26, 2005 9:55 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Infringement of John Wiley & Sons, Inc.'s Copyrights


July 26, 2005

To Whom it May Concern:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher
of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies
("Wiley").

We recently learned that unauthorized copies of the material listed below
are available for sale on a website hosted by your company at the following
URL address: http://aneas.net. The material is as follows:

1.    3ds Max 4 Bible (ISBN 0764535846) by Kelly Murdock (
http://aneas.net/ebooks/3D-Studio-Max-4-Bible.asp)
2.    3ds Max 6 Bible (ISBN 0764557637) by Kelly Murdock (
http://aneas.net/ebookz/3ds-max-6-Bible.asp)
3.    3G Handset and Network Design (ISBN 0471229369) by Geoff Varrall (
http://aneas.net/ebooks/3G-Handset-And-Network-Design.asp)
4.    50 Fast Photoshop 7 Techniques (ISBN 0764536729) by Gregory Georges (
http://aneas.net/ebooks/50-Fast-Photoshop-7-Techniques.asp)
5.    501 Website Secrets (ISBN 076455901X) by Michael Miller (
http://aneas.net/ebookz/501-W-Web-Site-Secrets-eb--Unleash-the-Power-of-Goog
le,-Amazon,-eBay-and-More.asp
)
6.    About Face 2.0 (ISBN 0764526413) by Alan Cooper (
http://aneas.net/ebooks/About-Face-2-0--The-Essentials-of-Interaction-Design
.asp
)
7.    Access 2002 Bible (ISBN 076453596X) by Cary Prague (
http://aneas.net/ebooks/Access-2002-Bible.asp and
http://aneas.net/ebookstore/MS-Access-2002-Bible.asp)

http://aneas.net/ebooks/Active-Directory-Bible.asp)

I have a good faith belief that the use of the title(s) identified above is
(are) not authorized by Wiley, its agent, or the law and therefore
constitute a serious infringement of, inter alia, Wiley's copyrights.

We understand that many responsible ISPs inadvertently infringe the
copyrights of others, and that this may be one such case.  Accordingly, we
will forbear legal action against your company provided that you comply with
the following:

1.    You remove or block access to the infringing matter within 48 hours
of the time and date of this e-mail; and

2.    You provide reasonably requested assistance in helping Wiley to find
and prosecute the responsible party/parties.  This includes sending me any
information you have on file regarding the owner of the offending website.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Sincerely,
Patrick Murphy
Paralegal
John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
111 River Street, Mail Stop 3-05
Hoboken, NJ  07030
Phone: 201-748-6014 / Fax: 201-748-6500
E-Mail Address: pmurphy@wiley.com

My name, typed above, constitutes an electronic signature under Federal law,
and is intended to be binding.


----- Forwarded by Patrick Murphy/Corp/Hoboken/Wiley on 07/26/2005 10:54 AM
-----
                                                                           
             "Legal Response"                                              
             <legal-response@                                              
             theplanet.com>                                             To 
                                      <pmurphy@wiley.com>                  
             07/23/2005 01:31                                           cc

                                                                   Subject 
                                      FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Infringement of

To whom it may concern:

Please note that your DMCA notification does not comply with section
512(c)(3)(A) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (the "Act")
because it is not addressed to The Planet's current designated agent for
receipt of notifications under the Act.  Please consult either our web site
(www.theplanet.com) or the US Copyright Office "Directory of Service
Provider Agents for Notification of Claims of Infringement" for information
on our current designated agent.

Legal Response Team
The Planet
